channel.title: Omg a random poem made by Ron
channel.description:
Wow this is so dumb...
I was carrying a sack, a beautiful woman came by with a huge rack. I said, hey sexy you got a mace? She said, why dont you come to my place. Before I knew it, chilling next to her dog on a nice red bed. She came out and looked so hot, I felt like my balls just dropped. She started to strip, showing off her rosy red lips, she had such a nice ass, wouldn't it be creepy if she passed gas? The rest is left to your imagination, but man oh man, was she a dream of creation!
You may be asking why I'm posting all this stuff? Because.. I'm so bored lol. And since this is a general discussion forum, it seems fine. :useotherwinkgrinfornow: ;D :D

item.title: Omg a random poem made by Ron
item.dc:creator: @kuiren2 Kuiren
item.description:
@kuiren2 wrote:

[quote=“Dizzy, post:8, topic:3144”]The best poem ever:

This is a poem,
make fun of it and you die,
this is a pretty damn good poem,
so stfu with your damn insults,
bastards…

:D[/quote]

lol ^^^best poem ever

*edit=can i put this in my sig quoted ;D
